testimonials.name: Manu Gupta
testimonials.content: This retreat was life-changing! I feel rejuvenated and more connected to myself.

testimonials.name: Manisha
testimonials.content: The yoga sessions were amazing, and the instructors were very supportive.

testimonials.content: I loved the peaceful environment and the sense of community. Highly recommend!
